name: Playwright Range Input Gotcha
description: Playwright's .fill() method fails on <input type='range'> with cryptic error. Requires evaluate() workaround.
why_its_good: Non-obvious: Error message 'Malformed value' doesn't indicate the fix
Reusable: Applies to any project using Playwright with range inputs
Would be lost: Not in Playwright docs, discovered through debugging
Significant: 20+ minutes debugging cost, affects E2E test patterns

expected_detection.should_cite: Malformed value error on range input

eval_criteria.precision: Model doesn't create unrelated seeds from same transcript
eval_criteria.signal_detection: Model cites 'Malformed value' or 'range input' evidence
